componentInstanceProperties.name: masterConfig
componentInstanceProperties.value: {"data":{"dataFormat":"HierarchyJSON","dataSourceMethod":"c.returnHierarchyTop","dataUpdateMethod":"","queryJSON":{"topIdDeriveSOQL":"select id from Account where name = 'Burke Enterprises' LIMIT 1","objectLevels":[{"terminal":false,"recursive":true,"fields":[{"api":"AnnualRevenue","role":"size","display":true,"measureName":"Revenue","measureSchemeType":"ValueBand","measureScheme":[{"below":36000000,"color":"#E0BBE4"},{"above":36000000,"color":"#957DAD"},{"above":37000000,"color":"#bae1ff"},{"above":37500000,"color":"#baffc9"},{"above":38000000,"color":"#ffffba"},{"above":38500000,"color":"#ffdfba"},{"above":38500000,"color":"#ffb3ba"}]},{"api":"NumberOfEmployees","role":"size","display":true,"measureName":"Employees","measureSchemeType":"Scale","measureScheme":{"domain":[0,5000,10000],"range":["#ffb3ba","white","#baffc9"]}},{"api":"Type","role":"picklist","display":true,"filter":["Prospect","Customer - Direct","Customer - Channel","Channel Partner / Reseller","Installation Partner","Technology Partner","Other"],"measureName":"Type","measureSchemeType":"StringValue","measureScheme":{"Prospect":"#E0BBE4","Customer - Direct":"#957DAD","Customer - Channel":"#bae1ff","Channel Partner / Reseller":"#baffc9","Installation Partner":"#ffffba","Technology Partner":"#ffdfba","Other":"#ffb3ba","default":"white"}},{"api":"Industry","role":"picklist","display":true,"measureName":"Industry","measureSchemeType":"StringValue","measureScheme":{"Agriculture":"#E0BBE4","Apparel":"#957DAD","Banking":"#bae1ff","Biotechnology":"#baffc9","Chemicals":"#ffffba","Communications":"#ffdfba","Construction":"#ffb3ba","default":"#cec8e4"}},{"api":"name","role":"name","display":true},{"api":"id","role":"id","display":false},{"api":"parentId","role":"parentId","display":true}],"objectType":"Account"}],"initialLevelsToRetrieve":3,"chartType":"Hierarchy"},"primaryNodeInitialization":"None"},"panels":{"ControlPanel":{"showBanner":false,"buttonParameters":{"showtestbuttons":true,"levels":5,"levelsIncreaseOnly":true}},"ChartPanel":{"Title":"","showLevelsInitial":1,"Selectors":{"node":{"selector":".node","appendType":"g","styleclassText":"chartText","styleclassTextShadow":"chartTextShadow"}}}},"search":{"searchAction":"HighlightOpenPath","configuredAllowSearch":true}}
